property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may take a Wing Spark, Secret Safeguard from your deck, show that spell to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, after you do, you may cast that spell from your graveyard for no cost. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. From among the revealed cards, add any number of Tristone and Zombie Dragon to your hand. For each card added, your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it. Put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks one of your opponents and isn't blocked, if you have 7 or more Dreammate creatures, you win the game. Otherwise, stop the attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ATTACK CHANCE}: Beethoven, Zenith of "Horror" (When one of your Beethoven, Zenith of "Horror"s attacks, you may cast this spell for no cost.) ■ Draw up to 5 cards. Then your opponent chooses 3 cards in your hand at random and you reveal them to your opponent. You may put any number of Dragons from among them.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ATTACK CHANCE}: Onimaru "Ogre", Golden Dragon (When one of your Onimaru "Ogre", Golden Dragons attacks, you may cast this spell for no cost.) ■ Reveal the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put any number of non-evolution Alien or Hunter creatures from them into the battle zone. Each of those creatures gets "speed attacker" until the end of the turn. Then put the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ When this creature would be discarded from your hand by the ability of one of your opponent's creatures or spells, you may put it into the battle zone instead. ■ Whenever your opponent would choose a creature in the battle zone, they can't choose this one. (It can still be attacked or blocked.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {ATTACK CHANCE}: Truename Wakuwaku Chappurun (When one of your Truename Wakuwaku Chappuruns attacks, you may cast this spell for no cost.) ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Then, for each of your opponent's tapped creatures in the battle zone, draw a card. ■ Untap one of your "Truename Wakuwaku Chappurun" in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, if there is a creature in the battle zone that has "double breaker", this turn, this creature gets +5000 power and "double breaker". ■ Whenever this creature attacks, if there is a creature in the battle zone that has "triple breaker", this turn, this creature gets +11000 power and "triple breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creature in the battle zone, return it to its owner's hand, and draw a card. Then play Gachinko Judge with your opponent. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.) ■ Each time you win Gachinko Judge this way, you may use this spell's first ability again.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each of your Commands in the battle zone, your opponent discards a card at random from their hand. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy 2 of your creatures. Then your opponent chooses one of their creatures and destroys it.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ If you have a Dragon creature that costs 7 or more in the battle zone, this creature gets "power attacker +7000" and "double breaker".

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Each turn, the third creature you summon may cost up to 3 less to summon. It can't cost less than 1.

From among them, take a card that has the same name and put it into the battle zone. If you looked at your deck in this way, shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players. ■ Whenever this creature blocks, untap all your other Guardians in the battle zone.

card.name: Sagrada Familia, Vizier of Instant Seal

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ While this creature is tapped, your opponent can't use the "shield trigger" ability of spells.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Tap all your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. ■ You and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, after you cast this spell, return it to your hand instead of your graveyard. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card for each of your creatures in the battle zone that cost 7 or more. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack. ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw a card. If you do, put a card from your hand on the top of your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Draw 3 cards. ■ You and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, after you cast this spell, return it to your hand instead of your graveyard. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Instead of having this creature attack, you may tap it to use its {TAP} ability. {TAP} You may destroy 3 of your creatures Zekkoucho, Necrodragon Gyouten Kyoutei and Necrodragon Saidesuka Gunmaster in the battle zone. If you do, choose any number of zones from your deck, graveyard or hand. You may take a Truename Screaming Psycho from among it and put it into the battle zone. If you searched your deck, shuffle it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your opponent discards 2 cards at random from their hand. ■ You and your opponent play Gachinko Judge. If you win, after you cast this spell, return it to your hand instead of your graveyard. (Gachinko Judge: Each player reveals the top card of their deck, then puts it on the bottom. You win if your card costs the same as or more than your opponent.)

property.name: Rules

You may put the top 3 cards of your deck into your mana zone. Then you may tap this creature. ■ If your opponent's creatures attack, they attack this creature if able. ■ Each of your Dragons and Commands gets "Eternal Omega". (When a creature that has "Eternal Omega" would leave, it returns to your hand instead.)
